scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c blue,green "npm --workspace apps/frontend run dev" "npm --workspace apps/backend run dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n frontend,backend,agentic -c blue,green,magenta "npm --workspace apps/frontend run dev" "npm --workspace apps/backend run dev" "npm run start:agentic"
scripts.build: npm --workspace apps/frontend run build && npm --workspace apps/backend run build
